param.caption: Address
param.desc: Specify the IP:Port for the game server.

param.caption: Password
param.desc: Game server password, just for private servers.

param.caption: Delay
param.desc: In seconds, delay between game server and TV.

param.caption: RCON password
param.desc: Password to access the HLTV console remotely.

game_config.post_install: echo '#!/bin/bash export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=".:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH" if test -e "hltv"; then if test -x "hltv"; then ./hltv $@ else echo "hltv: binary not executable." fi else echo "hltv: file not found." fi' > hltv_run chmod +x hltv_run
